pages.text: The $(mob)Siren$() is a monster that spawns in Swamps in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It attacks players at ranged and which may inflict $(thing)Slowness$() and $(thing)Weakness$() effects. The $(mob)Siren$() switches to melee and gains a $(thing)Speed$() effect, inflicting $(thing)Mining Fatigue II$() on hit. $(mob)Sirens$() are immune to $(thing)Poison$() and can move through water unimpeded. While in water, $(mob)Sirens$() heal for 10% of their health every 5 seconds and gain $(thing)Resistance$().
$(mob)Sirens$() drop $(item)Fish$() on death, which are a good source of food when cooked, and can be used to tame $(l:minecraft_ocelot)$(mob)Ocelots$().

$(mob)Sirens$() drop $(item)Sealed Quiver$() on death, which can be right-clicked while held to open and receive a small stack of potion arrows randomly chosen from among $(thing)Slowness$(), $(thing)Harming$(), $(thing)Poison$(), or $(thing)Weakness$() effects.
